com.leanplum

Class Var<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leanplum.Var<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the variable. Can be Boolean, Byte, Short, Integer, Long, Float, Double, Character, String, List, or Map. You may nest lists and maps arbitrarily.

    public class Var<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Leanplum variable.

      • define

        public static <T> Var<T> define(java.lang.String name,
                                T defaultValue,
                                java.lang.String kind)
        Defines a variable with kind. Can be Boolean, Byte, Short, Integer, Long, Float, Double, Character, String, List, or Map. You may nest lists and maps arbitrarily.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Boolean, Byte, Short, Integer, Long, Float, Double, Character, String, List, or Map.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the variable.
        defaultValue - Default value.
        kind - Kind of the variable.
        Returns:
        Initialized variable.
